name: Annual Inventory Consumption After 24th Month
description: If unrestricted stock is equal to consumption in the next 24 months, then 0. Else if consumption in the last 12 months is the same as the difference of current stock and consumption in the next 24 months, then value is the consumption in the next 24 months. Otherwise, value is the difference between current stock and consumption in the next 24 months. Can be toggled between quantity and amount values (default = quantity).
expression: VAR Usage = [Avg Monthly Inventory Consumption Last 12 Months] * 12
VAR Net = [Unrestricted Stock Quantity] - [Annual Inventory Consumption Next 12 Months] - [Annual Inventory Consumption After 12th Month]
[Unrestricted Stock Quantity] = ([Annual Inventory Consumption Next 12 Months] + [Annual Inventory Consumption After 12th Month]), BLANK(),
